query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Market analysis reports First Release
result.description: Task 6.6 First version of Market analysis, including barriers, players and competition. The analysis will be based on desk research of existing data complemented by other direct sources (interviews, surveys, etc.)

result.title: 2nd Analysis of impacts generated by Matchup C&D activities
result.description: Task 8.5 This report aims at analyzing in a quantitative way the impact of all communication and dissemination activities carried out during the life of the project. The objective is to get valuable conclusions about the replicability potential of the results analyzing the reached audience. This is the second report covering the period M19-M38

result.title: Review of barriers and solutions to overcome them
result.description: Task 6.2 UBIEFE, with the support of INN, VAL, TUD, ANT and DEM, will analyze those factors that have a positive and/or negative impact on business models. The report will cover both quantitative and qualitative information. The final objective is that Lighthouses cities find out the main success and failure factors.

result.title: Electrical vehicles and charging stations roll-out in Valencia - First Version
result.description: Subtask 2.5.1 ETRA will provide a study about the deployment of 72 eV charging points to support the present e-vehicles public network (e-buses, public e-cars, public e-bikes, etc.). result.title: Technical evaluation procedure
result.description: Task 5.1 VTT will develop a technical evaluation procedure to assess the performance of all technical solutions implemented in the demonstrations' actions. It will use the indicators defined by CITYKeys initiative: People, Planet, Prosperity, Governance and Propagation.

result.title: New Concept of high performance district in Dresden - First Version
result.description: Subtask 3.3.1 Definitions of interventions focused on achieving high energy efficiency rates in Johannstadt district in Dresden. The actions include extensive retrofitting and new constructions actions.

result.title: 1st Report on dissemination activities, workshops and events
result.description: Task 8.5 ICE, as part of the monitoring of the communication impact, will issue 3 reports on months 24, 48 and 60 to show the main outputs of workshops, events, and any other dissemination events. The report is not only a list of actions done, but an assessment of the impact of the project in such audiences during the covered period.

result.title: 1st Analysis of impacts generated by MAtchUP C&D activities
result.description: Task 8.5 This report aims at analyzing in a quantitative way the impact of all communication and dissemination activities carried out during the life of the project. The objective is to get valuable conclusions about the replicability potential of the results analyzing the reached audience. This is the first report covering the period M1-M18.
